p: We analyze a strong climate change scenario (RCP8.5) using a rising radiative forcing pathway leading to additional 8.5 W/m 2 (∼1370 ppm CO 2 equivalent) by 2100 and a medium climate change scenario (RCP4.5, ∼650 ppm CO 2 equivalent, see S3 Appendix) [ 39]. We compare two future time frames, 2030-2060 (mid century, ‘mc’) and 2070-2100 (end of century, ‘eoc’), to a historical reference time frame (1970-2000, ‘h’).
